data.title: Vue3 + 全家桶
data.content: 项目基于最新的vue3全家桶进行开发，全面使用最新的的RFC script setup语法标准，为你带来不一样的 vue3 开发体验

data.title: Element-Plus
data.content: Element Plus，一套为开发者、设计师和产品经理准备的基于 Vue 3.0 的桌面端组件库。是 Element UI 的官方 vue 3 兼容版本

data.title: vue-element-admin
data.content:
vue-element-admin 是一个后台前端解决方案，它基于 vue 和 element-ui实现，并有用 70K 的 star。
本项目使用最新 vue 技术对其进行了重构，并在其现有功能上进行了扩展，致力于为大家带来更加符合 现代后台开发的前端技术解决方案

data.title: ESLint + Git Hooks
data.content:
ESLint 对应编码规范，Git Hooks 对应 Git 规范。
想要开发出大厂标准的企业级项目，需要先从规范做起！

data.title: 架构设计
data.content: 阿里前端 P7 岗被称为 《技术专家》，也有人喜欢叫他们为 “前端架构师”，既然被称为 “架构师” ，那么架构设计当然是不可缺少的一环咯

data.title: 权限验证（页面权限、功能权限、动态权限、权限配置）
data.content: 全面的后台权限验证系统，实现了 页面权限、功能权限、动态权限、权限配置 等全方位的权限功能

data.title: 功能引导
data.content: 对用户的功能引导

data.title: 可配置 + 收缩侧边栏
data.content: 根据路由动态生成的 Menu 菜单，实现真正的 配置 Menu

data.title: 动态面包屑
data.content: 动态生成的面包屑数据

data.title: Tags View
data.content: 便签快捷导航功能

data.title: svg sprite 图标
data.content: 自定义的 svg Icon 配合 el Icon 自动分配导入

data.title: 国际化
data.content: 多语言的国际化功能实现

data.title: 动态换肤
data.content: 主题更换功能，提供缓存实现

data.title: 页面搜索
data.content: 根据路由配置自动化生成的页面搜索数据，无需手动配置

data.title: excel 导出、导入
data.content: excel 表格的导入、导出实现

data.title: zip 导入
data.content: 页面数据导出为 zip

data.title: 富文本 + MarkDown 编辑器
data.content: 常用的编辑器功能，包含 富文本编辑器 && MarkDown 编辑器

data.title: 动态表格 + 拖拽表格 + 内联编辑表格
data.content: 表格列表的常见操作，多用于包含表格项的展示功能中。包括：动态表格 && 拖拽表格 && 内联编辑表格

data.title: 统一错误处理
data.content: 页面级的错误处理由 vue-router 统一处理。包含 401 和 404 的错误处理

data.title: 发布
data.content: 构建与发布

data.title: 其他
data.content: 除了以上功能之外，我们还实现了很多其他的功能，比如：CDN、动态的环境变量配置、懒加载、跨域等等

data.title: Vue3 + family bucket
data.content: The project is developed based on the latest vue3 family bucket, fully using the latest RFC script setupSyntax standards, bring you a different vue3 development experience

data.title: Element-Plus
data.content: Element Plus, a set for developers, designers and product managers The desktop component library based on Vue 3.0. Is the official vue 3 compatible version of Element UI

data.title: vue-element-admin
data.content:
vue-element-admin is a backend Front-end solution, it is based on vue and element-ui implementation, and 70K star< /a>.
This project uses the latest vue technology to reconstruct it, and expand its existing functions, and is committed to bringing you a front-end technology solution that is more in line with modern back-end development

data.title: ESLint + Git Hooks
data.content:
ESLint corresponds to the coding standard, and Git Hooks corresponds to the Git standard.
If you want to develop a large-scale enterprise-level project, you need to start with the specifications!

data.title: Architecture design
data.content: Ali front-end P7 post is called 'technical expert', and some people like to call them 'front-end architect'. Since they are called 'architect', architecture design is of course an indispensable part.

data.title: Authority verification (page authority, function authority, dynamic authority, authority configuration)
data.content: A comprehensive background authority verification system, which implements a full range of authority functions such as page authority, function authority, dynamic authority, authority configuration, etc.

data.title: Function guide
data.content: Function guidance to users

data.title: Configurable + shrink sidebar
data.content: Realize the real configuration Menu according to the Menu menu dynamically generated by the routing

data.title: Dynamic breadcrumbs
data.content: Dynamically generated breadcrumb data

data.title: Tags View
data.content: Notes quick navigation function

data.title: svg sprite icon
data.content: Customized svg Icon is automatically assigned and imported with el Icon

data.title: Internationalization
data.content: Multi-language internationalization function realization

data.title: Dynamic skinning
data.content: Theme replacement function, provide cache implementation

data.title: Page search
data.content: Search data based on the page automatically generated by the routing configuration, without manual configuration

data.title: excel export, import
data.content: Import and export of excel tables

data.title: zip import
data.content: Export page data as zip

data.title: Rich text + MarkDown editor
data.content: Commonly used editor functions, including rich text editor && MarkDown editor

data.title: Dynamic table + drag and drop table + inline editing table
data.content: Common operations of table lists are mostly used in display functions that contain table items. Including: dynamic table && drag and drop table && inline editing table

data.title: Unified error handling
data.content: The page-level error handling is handled uniformly by vue-router. Including 401 and 404 error handling

data.title: release
data.content: Build and release

data.title: other
data.content: In addition to the above functions, we have also implemented many other functions, such as: CDN, dynamic environment variable configuration, lazy loading, cross-domain, etc.
